rukus.text: lekad erselna nuhan ila kavmihi fekale ya kavmi-`budu-llahe ma lekum min ilahin gayruh. inni ehafu `aleykum `azabe yevmin `azim
kale-lmeleu min kavmihi inna lenerake fi dalalim mubin
kale ya kavmi leyse bi dalaletuv velakinni rasulum mir rabbi-l`alemin
ubelligukum risalati rabbi veensahu lekum vea`lemu mine-llahi ma la ta`lemun
eve`acibtum en caekum zikrum mir rabbikum `ala raculim minkum liyunzirakum velitetteku vele`allekum turhamun
fekezzebuhu feenceynahu vellezine me`ahu fi-lfulki veagrakne-llezine kezzebu biayatina. innehum kanu kavmen `amin
